definition: providing or experiencing physical well-being or relief (`comfy' is informal)
details:
adjective
- providing or experiencing physical well-being or relief (`comfy' is informal)
= example: providing or experiencing physical well-being or relief (`comfy' is informal)
= synonyms: comfy
- free from stress or conducive to mental ease
- in fortunate circumstances financially
= synonyms: prosperous
- sufficient to provide comfort
= example: sufficient to provide comfort
- more than adequate
= example: more than adequate
= synonyms: generous
